name: Super Spike!
description:
complete  5 super fast paced and difficult levels filled with loads of spikes to avoid and lots of platforms to explore!  Jump your way to the end in this short but difficult 2d platformer.

Controls: 

0 - Toggle Full-screen

Enter - Start

M/C - Run

W/Up/Space - Jump

A/Left - Move Left

D/Right - Move Right
